announcement_body.headline: 7.40b Gameplay Patch
body: [p]Patch 7.40b is out now and you can check out the patch notes [url="https://www.dota2.com/patches/7.40b"]here[/url].
In addition, over the last few days we've addressed the following issues:

[/p][list][*][p]Fixed Dota+ Talent Pickrates and Winrates not properly aggregating[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed "Learn Ability" toggle not closing automatically after level 24[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed incorrect hitboxes for multiple Observer and Sentry ward cosmetics[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Smoke of Deceit not working from the backpack if it started in the backpack[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Rattlecage damage not being classified as reflection[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Rattlecage not working if crafted while dead[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Bloodseeker's Scepter upgrade not having the correct cooldown[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Bounty Hunter revealing his location if casting Track while invisible in the fog of war[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Brewmaster's Aghanim's Shard Health Regen always being active below 50% health, even if the strong drink wasn't drunk[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Skeletons summoned by Clinkz having incorrect attack priority[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Clockwerk Cogs not bouncing enemies properly with the Expanded Armature Facet[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Enchantress Rabble Rouser not applying to skeletons summoned by Dark Troll Summoner and Shard Golems[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Juggernaut's Omnislash and other abilities that require continuous vision over their target not functioning during Mars' Arena of Blood and other abilities that conditionally remove vision sharing between allies[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Kez Bleed Stack getting removed if the impale was a backstab[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Kez impale failing causing it trigger incorrectly later[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Kez being unable to trigger Raven's Veil mark with his first attack after casting if it was at his maximum attack range[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Kez being able to trigger Marks twice during Raptor Dance with specific settings and items configuration[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Largo's Catchy Lick not dispelling allies if they are under the effect of Black King Bar[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Largo's Catchy Lick dispelling High Five[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Largo's Amphibian Rhapsody HUD not showing for people who have disabled map_enable_portrait_worlds[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Largo's Froglings blocking neutral camp respawns[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Lotus Orb not dispelling when copied by Largo's Aghanim's Shard[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Linken's Sphere not being copied by Largo's Aghanim's Shard[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Lina's Combustion also combusting Croak of Genius damage[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Spirit Bear not breaking Phantom Assassin's Blur[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Oracle's Fate's Edict interactions with Debuff Immunity[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Oracle being unable to dispel the disarm portion of Fate's Edict on allies[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Phantom Lancer's shard illusion not benefting from Illusory Armaments[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Rubick losing abilities when dying or stealing another ability while casting Amphibian Rhapsody with Aghanim's Scepter[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Shadow Demon Disruption effects not being visible if Shadow Demon himself is in Fog of War[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Spectre's level 25 talent not applying to all types of illusions[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Tiny's Avalanche lasting 0.2s longer than intended[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Troll Warlord's Battle Trance dispelling Ice Blast when Ice Blast's kill threshold is triggered while Troll Warlord is stunned and Troll Warlord has Battle Trance cast queued[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Ursa roaring when casting Earthshock with Aghanim's Shard[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Visage Familiar recall ability not working[/p][/*][/list]
